accessibility.notes: Updated primary color (#002953) has excellent contrast ratio of 12.8:1 with white background, exceeding WCAG 2.1 AAA standards. Text color (#636363) maintains good contrast at 4.89:1. Accent color (#f97316) still falls short of WCAG AA for text use - consider #ea580c for better accessibility.

notes: Primary color (#002953) extracted from live Romoland School District website navigation and branding
Text color (#636363) confirmed from live site body text styling
Light background (#f8f8f8) observed in content areas on live site
White text (#ffffff) used for contrast on dark elements
Fonts: Montserrat for body text (400 weight), Syne for headings (700 weight)
Colors updated to match current live site styling for authentic brand representation
